name: Mined-Out
overview: Mined-Out involves guiding a character across a screen covered with mines. He can move in any of the four main directions. At each point, he is told how many of these four squares have mines in, but not the exact locations of the mines, making completion a precarious challenge. There are 8 skill levels, each with progressively more and more mines. After each level, you are showed an 'action replay' of your path, as well as a full diagram of where each mine was.
